title: My Document with Python + Kedro + Quarto
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable Python code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: My Document with Python + Kedro + Quarto
text:
Running Python Code
When you render this document, it will include both the content and the output of the embedded Python code.
Here’s a simple Python calculation:

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(
  subplot_kw = {'projection': 'polar'} 
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()







Figure 1: A line plot on a polar axis
